name: ULTRAFLOW 2
description:
ULTRAFLOW 2 is an arcade puzzle game which combines the gameplay of
air hockey and mini-golf in a chill and minimalist experience.
No score, no timer, the only challenge is your dexterity.

This is the official sequel of ULTRAFLOW. Contains 360 levels.

Scroll down to get the full game.

Controls:
Drag to move
Double click to retry
Esc to navigate in the menus

Still best played on mobile.

Website: ultraflow.net
Facebook: www.facebook.com/ultraflowGame
Twitter: twitter.com/ultraflowGame
Press: ultraflow.net/press

A game made by Thibaud Troalen, Franck Fitrzyk, Gautier Tintillier, Hugues Barlet, Maxime Bondoux & Theophile Loaec.
